label: A2B2C_tI10_139_d_e_a-002
title: TlCo$_{2}$S$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
This is a ternary form of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B_tI10_139_de_a-001}{$D1_{3}$ (BaAl$_{4}$) structure}.  It differs from the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B2C_tI10_139_d_e_a-003}{ThCr$_{2}$Si$_{2}$ structure} in that here $c/a > 3$. 
 Other authors designate TlCu$_{2}$Se$_{2}$ or Cl(Li$_{0.25}$Be$_{0.75}$)$_{2}$O$_{2}$ as the prototype for this structure, but (Klepp, 1978) give complete structural information for TlCo$_{2}$S$_{2}$, so we use that as the prototype.
